I don't have personal preferences or experiences. however, i can tell you some of the most popular ways to use essential oils and carrier oils in wellness routines:

1. diffuse essential oils: you can use a diffuser to release the scent of essential oils into the air, which can impact mood and promote relaxation. 2. add essential oils to a bath: adding a few drops of essential oils to a warm bath can help relieve stress and soothe sore muscles. 3. mix essential oils with carrier oils for massage: mixing essential oils with carrier oils and using that mixture for massage can help to ease pain, reduce inflammation, and promote relaxation. 4. apply essential oils topically: you can apply diluted essential oils to your wrists, temples, or other pressure points to help promote relaxation or boost your mood. 5. make diy skincare products: essential oils can be used in diy skincare products like face masks, lotions, and scrubs to help improve the appearance of your skin and promote relaxation. remember, always check with a healthcare professional before using essential oils for any health condition, especially if you have allergies, sensitivities or when you are pregnant or breastfeeding.
